attributes.action: Make ID cards (IF they are introduced) cheap, and not a scam.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How come we are told that ID cards may cost between £60-140 per person? In some countries (I forget which) but whereever it was had ID cards which cost around £6 each, surely we should'nt try to cripple low-income (<£15k) families if we are trying to make them buy something which might help against terrorism. Besides, retinal ID cards are even cheaper, and can be harder to forge...hmmm.

Invade France!

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/FreeIDCard/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
